level.heading: Cashing government checks of District residents required.
Legislative History of Law 4-40
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-40, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-341.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-56
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-56, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-341.

level.heading: Transfer of Functions
level.text: The functions of the Department of Transportation were transferred to the Department of Public Works by Reorganization Plan No. 4 of 1983, effective March 1, 1984.
